io.jeo.geojson

Class GeoJSON

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.jeo.data.FileDriver<T>
      • io.jeo.vector.FileVectorDriver<GeoJSONDataset>
        • io.jeo.geojson.GeoJSON
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Driver<GeoJSONDataset>, VectorDriver<GeoJSONDataset>

    public class GeoJSON
extends FileVectorDriver<GeoJSONDataset>
    GeoJSON format driver.

    Usage: 

    
 GeoJSON.open(new File("states.json"));

    Author:
    Justin Deoliveira, OpenGeo

      • open

      • name

        public String name()
        Description copied from interface: Driver
        Name identifying the driver.

        This name should be no more than a few words (ideally one). It isn't meant to be a description but should be human readable.

      • aliases

        public List<String> aliases()
        Description copied from interface: Driver
        Secondary names identifying the driver.

        Aliases are typically shorter abbreviations for Driver.name()

      • capabilities

        public Set<Driver.Capability> capabilities()
        Description copied from interface: Driver
        The driver capabilities that declare what operations the driver is capable of handling natively.

        For example, to check if a vector driver supports bounding box queries. 

           VectorDriver drv = ...;
   if (drv.capabilities().contains(VectorDriver.BOUND)) {
       // driver supports native bbox queries
   }
